channel.title: [RS2][SRL][Divi] Drag's Fishing Helper
channel.description:
This is just a simple Auto-Dropper used for when your fishing. This was originally just for personal use but I thought i might as well save someone a few minutes :PIt WILL drop everything from the 3'rd slot to the 28th slot, leaving room ONLY for the pole and feathers/bait. Enjoy :)
*Uses SRL Dropping procedure.* *Scar Divi 3.06*
EDIT: I Fixed a little bug most of you would have caught anyway :P

item.title: [RS2][SRL][Divi] Drag's Fishing Helper

@grayfoxx wrote:

HELL YESS!!! EXACTLY WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR!!! KEY BOARD ON CRRRRRACK BECAUSE ITS SO HAPPY (so is my mouse! ^.^) BECAUSE I DONT HAVE TO MANAULLY DROP ANYTHUING ANYMORE!!! WEWTNESS!!! TY TY TY TY ILY!!

not really…>.>[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2009, 10:16:16 pm[/size][hr]my srl button in files wont take me to download it. help me please. please.

item.title: [RS2][SRL][Divi] Drag's Fishing Helper
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

So this is basically for somebody who is ACTUALLY power fishing manually, and doesn’t want to drop all the fish himself.

I don’t know who would actually find this useful, but it’s a decent script nonetheless.
Maybe the few legit players out there will get good use out of this
